This keeps on happening in my Poseidon. Does anyone else have this? Or is it just me? (Note: I did check CoM and auto-aligned the wheel too)

This keeps on happening in my Poseidon. Does anyone else have this? Or is it just me? (Note: I did check CoM and auto-aligned the wheel too)http://i.imgur.com/gizsk7t.jpg

Har too figure out what is wrong on this picture. Care to elaborate ?

Har too figure out what is wrong on this picture. Care to elaborate ?

The plane is leaning to one side.
Increase the spring constant and/or decrease the damper.
Really looking forward to the fix for FAR hard to make a great plane with excess drag from the landing gear. Thanks!

New large landing gears don't suffer from that bug. You can use those in combination with stock landing gears.

Not the best solution, but good workaround while waiting for update to be released.

This keeps on happening in my Poseidon. Does anyone else have this? Or is it just me? (Note: I did check CoM and auto-aligned the wheel too)http://i.imgur.com/gizsk7t.jpg

The issue is your aircraft is to heavy for the two gear you have in the back. The easiest fix is to add a second pair of landing gear near them like this craft from my last install of KSP.

Notice how it has extra pairs of gear to take the added weight of the craft.

Or this one which is set up slightly differently.

Update v1.1.1

- Fixed sound file path for small landing gear

- Removed invisible box (FAR voxel is now correct)

- Changed steering to wheelSteer instead of yaw

- Converted textures to DDS format

I was delaying so I could try to implement mass and cost scaling and heat shielding but decided I should release it with the fixes first.

Delete your old AdjustableLandingGear folder first to get rid of the png textures before updating.

Awesome mod! Surely downloading this.

I have one suggestion:

For the one-wheeled landing gear, could you make one where the wheel is at the center, not to the right or left, please?

Edited May 17, 2015 by TrainEngie

Awesome mod! Surely downloading this.

I have one suggestion:

For the one-wheeled landing gear, could you make one where the wheel is at the center, not to the right or left, please?

Wheel in center does not look good when you adjust leg on angle and also align wheel to ground. If you need straight centered wheel in front, for example, combine adjustable gears with stock ones.
Thanks for the update, I love them!
Update for FAR? OMG yes! I love you BahamutoD <3

Update v1.1.1

- Fixed sound file path for small landing gear

- Removed invisible box (FAR voxel is now correct)

- Changed steering to wheelSteer instead of yaw

- Converted textures to DDS format

I was delaying so I could try to implement mass and cost scaling and heat shielding but decided I should release it with the fixes first.

Delete your old AdjustableLandingGear folder first to get rid of the png textures before updating.

Excellent news, Bahamuto, many thanks for the update.
